sentences.en: An irresistible disappointment took possession of her, and she wept broken - heartedly.
sentences.cn: 于是一种不可抗拒的绝望的感觉紧紧地抓住了她.她忍不住伤心地哭起来.

sentences.en: Carrie smiled under his irresistible flood of geniality.
sentences.cn: "他的亲切友好像一股不可抗拒的暖流,嘉莉不禁微笑了.

sentences.en: He felt an irresistible impulse to rush into the room.
sentences.cn: 他有一种难以抗拒的冲动想冲进房间.

sentences.en: I felt an irresistible urge to laugh.
I was overcome by an irresistible urge to cry.
sentences.cn: 我控制不住想大哭一场。

sentences.en: In the final analysis the will of the people is irresistible.
sentences.cn: 归根到底,人民的意志是不可抗拒的.

sentences.en: Keegan's team have been cutting an irresistible swathe through the first division.
sentences.cn: 基冈的球队在甲级赛中所向披靡。

sentences.en: Later, she would describe his magnetism as irresistible.
sentences.cn: 她过后说起时会形容他的魅力难以抵挡。
男人们觉得无法抗拒纳塔莉的魅力。
这种魅力是无法抵御的.
音乐非常好听，令人难以抗拒。

sentences.en: The people's will is irresistible and will carry all before it.
sentences.cn: 人民的意志不可抗拒,势不可挡.

sentences.en: The urge to fast-forward is almost irresistible.
sentences.cn: 快速进带的冲动几乎压制不住。

sentences.en: The wheel of history rolls forward with an irresistible force.
sentences.cn: 历史车轮滚滚向前,势不可挡.

sentences.en: Their arguments were irresistible; I had to agree.
sentences.cn: 他们的论据很有说服力, 我也不得不同意.

sentences.en: There is one thing I would like to know—What is it about Tim that you find so irresistible?
sentences.cn: 有一件事我很想知道——蒂姆到底哪一点让你对他如此倾心？

sentences.en: They feel the case for change is irresistible.
sentences.cn: 他们认为求变的理由不容反驳。

words.tran_cn: 无法抵抗地；不能压制地；极为诱惑人地

trans.tran_cn: 无法抗拒的，诱惑人的，具有非常的魅力的，不可抗拒，不可阻挡
trans.tran_en: too strong or powerful to be stopped or prevented
